sentences.sContent: The bank charges a fixed rate for each transaction.
sentences.sCn: 银行对每一笔业务收取固定费用。

sentences.sContent: ...The two firms have warned all parties in the transaction chain-merchant...

...noting that banks and merchants have spent the past decade suing each other over interchange fees-the percentage of the transaction price they keep-rather than deal with the growing hacking problem...
...Online purchases can be made by setting up a separate transaction code...

exam.question: It will be safer to walk the streets because people will not need to carry large amounts of cash； virtually all financial ______ will be conducted by computer.

answer.explain: 句意： 由于我们不必携带大量现金， 所以还是走路比较安全； 实际上所有的金融交易都是由电脑来完成的。transmission： 传送； transition： 转变； transformation： 转化； 改革。

exam.question: He attends to the ______ of important business himself.

answer.explain: 句意： 他打算亲自做这笔重要的生意。

synos.tran: [贸易]交易；[计]事务；办理；会报，[图情]学报

phrases.pCn: 金融业务；财务交易，财务事项
事务处理服务；事务处理业务
关联方交易；集团内交易；内幕交易

remMethod.val: trans(交换) ＋ act(行为) ＋ ion → 交易

words.tran: 办理人；做交易的人；处理者

trans.tranOther: a business deal or action, such as buying or selling something
